channel.title: Will this work?
channel.description:
Ok, most people know me for my clients. But i hate servers and i have ben trying to get one done for a while now, will this be an easyer way for npc's to drop items? Tell me were to add it and if theres a couple things left out.
[code]
If(NPC("9")isDead == true) spawnItem("4633, 1"); }
[/code] I know theres a few problems but i just hand wrote this..

item.title: Will this work?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Ok, most people know me for my clients. But i hate servers and i have ben trying to get one done for a while now, will this be an easyer way for npc’s to drop items? Tell me were to add it and if theres a couple things left out.


  If(NPC("9")isDead == true)
      spawnItem("4633, 1");
}

I know theres a few problems but i just hand wrote this…

Read full topic
